mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (EMAIL , NAME , PASSWORD , SALT , JOIN_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_IP , LATEST_PASSWORD_CHANGE_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_DATE , LATEST_LOGIN_FAIL_DATE , LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT , LOGIN_YN , BLOCK_YN) VALUES (#{email} , #{name} , #{password} , #{salt} , SYSDATE , NULL , SYSDATE , NULL , NULL , 0 , 'N' , 'N' )
